title: Replication "command=details" fails if using basic authentication
description: In SOLR-1189, ReplicationHandler added support for basic authentication.  However, if basic authentication is being used, passing "command=details" to a slave results in a failure getting details from the master.  The authentication parameters are ignored for this inter-node call.

comments.author: James Dyer
comments.content: problem was due to user error.
